meanings.sent1: The children had unrestricted access to the playground.
meanings.sent2: The unrestricted flow of water filled the riverbanks.
meanings.sent3: The unrestricted laughter of the students echoed through the school hallways.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity knew no bounds, like an unrestricted river flowing freely.
meanings.sent5: The bird soared through the sky with unrestricted grace and ease.

meanings.definition: Not subject to restrictions or limitations
meanings.sent1: The artist had unrestricted freedom to paint whatever she desired.
meanings.sent2: The unrestricted internet access allowed users to browse without constraints.
meanings.sent3: The unrestricted sale on shoes caused a frenzy at the store.
meanings.sent4: His mind was an unrestricted playground of ideas, constantly expanding.
meanings.sent5: The wind carried the kite high into the sky, its movement unrestricted by obstacles.
